name: 2D Rocket League
description:
2 player local Rocket League style game

Controls:

WASD (RED), Spacebar (BOOST RED)

Arrow Keys (Blue), INSERT/0 (NUMPAD) (BOOST BLUE)

CREATIVE MODE:

HOLD ESC TO ENTER THE CREATIVE MAP

FROM THERE USE:

1 / 2 / 3 KEYS TO SPAWN PROPS

Once you are done with your creation press "OK"

if you wish to save your map use the "[" key

and to load the map again use the "]" key

More useful little things in creative include

Holding SHIFT and LEFT CLICKING AND RIGHT CLICKING enables faster creation but is not tweaked correctly but give it a try :)

Thanks :)

WORKS IN SCHOOL
